doc.title: Koo tae patihan
doc.plot: As if by magic, Tannum meets her elementary school friend when her life is in danger. After that encounter, Mooton keeps appearing when Tannum is most in need and always help her through whatever difficulty she is facing. One day, when Tannum and Mooton realizes that Tannum has heart disease, they decide to spend her last moments together as each has realized that they are deeply in love. During their vacation on the beach one day, Mooton suddenly feels a serious pain in his chest and vanishes into thin air. Tannum does not know what to make of it but is determine to solve the mystery behind her lover's disappearance. What she finds will both break and save her heart.
